title: state
extract: A state is a compulsory political organization with a centralized government that maintains a monopoly on the legitimate use of force within a certain geographical territory. Some states are sovereign; other states are subject to external sovereignty or hegemony, where ultimate sovereignty lies in another state.
extract_html: A state is a compulsory political organization with a centralized government that maintains a monopoly on the legitimate use of force within a certain geographical territory. Some states are sovereign; other states are subject to external sovereignty or hegemony, where ultimate sovereignty lies in another state.
